titleStmt.title: The royal shepherdess a tragi-comedy, acted by His Highness the Duke of York's servants.
titleStmt.author: Shadwell, Thomas, 1642?-1692.
J. F. (John Fountain). Rewards of vertue.

notesStmt.note: Adaptation of: The rewards of vertue / John Fountain.

"This play, before I took it in hand, was wrote by one Mr. Fountain of Devonshire ... I have added little to the story, onely have represented that in action, which was expressed by him in long narrations"--Epistle to the reader, signed Tho. Shadwell.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
